Love free stuff? Go green and reuse!

Never miss an item with Castanet Notifications app. This simple application provides desktop alerts for any new item posted in the free section of the castanet market place (https://classifieds.castanet.net/cat/garage-free-auctions/free_items_go_green_and_reuse/)

*** Note: Make sure to enable desktop notifications for chrome ***
